inclusion.criterion: obesity, BMI > P. 97 (Jenni et al., 2011) or overweight, BMI >P.90, plus risk factors
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: major somatic or psychiatric disease without adequate treatment,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: weight-relevant medication (antiepileptic drugs, methylphenhydate and similar medication),
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
